turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to get an order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which starbucks do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's see, I think there's one on.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think there's one on Montgomery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what drink would u like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get a a grande Flat White.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what milk did you want in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want 2% for that hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hot or iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long will it take to be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: if i place the order now, it should take about 10 minutes to be ready for pick up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you'd like to order a grande flat white with 2% milk from Starbucks on montgomery street. did i get that right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $3.00 is the total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i process the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead. I'll pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed. as i said, it'll be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the receipt will be sent to your phone soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool, good bye.
